questions.question: Identify the simple lipid from the following?
All of the following are complex lipids, Except?
Rancidity of lipids of lipid rich food stuffs is due to:?
Which of the following statement is true?

answers.a: Oxidative rancidity is observed more frequently in animal fats than vegetable fats
answers.b: Oxidative rancidity is observed more frequently in vegetable fats than animal fats
answers.c: Plants fats ado not undergo oxidative rancidity
answers.d: Oxidative rancidity can be effectively checked by dehydrogenation of fatty acids

questions.question: Number of milligrams of KOH required to neutralize fatty acid present in 1 g of fat is called?
